syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
  // === Editor ===
  "editor.fontFamily": "Cascadia Code NF, Cascadia Code, JetBrains Mono, JetBrainsMono Nerd Font, Siji, siji",
  "editor.fontLigatures": "'calt', 'ss01'",
  "editor.codeLensFontFamily": "Cascadia Code NF, Cascadia Code, JetBrains Mono, JetBrainsMono Nerd Font",
  "editor.fontSize": 15,
  "editor.fontWeight": "400",
  "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
  "editor.tabSize": 2,
  "editor.insertSpaces": true,
  "editor.linkedEditing": true,
  "editor.glyphMargin": true,
  "editor.suggest.preview": true,
  "editor.inlineSuggest.enabled": true,
  "editor.semanticHighlighting.enabled": false,
  "editor.bracketPairColorization.enabled": true,
  "editor.bracketPairColorization.independentColorPoolPerBracketType": true,
  "editor.guides.bracketPairs": "active",
  "editor.letterSpacing": 0.5,
  "editor.scrollbar.scrollByPage": true,
  "editor.smoothScrolling": true,
  "editor.stickyScroll.enabled": true,
  "editor.codeActionsOnSave": { "source.fixAll.eslint": "explicit" },

  // === Terminal ===
  "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "Cascadia Code PL, Cascadia Code NF,  Cascadia Code",
  "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 14,
  "terminal.integrated.lineHeight": 1.4,
  "terminal.integrated.letterSpacing": 0.5,
  "terminal.integrated.fontLigatures.featureSettings": "'calt', 'ss01', 'ss02', 'ss03', 'ss04', 'ss05', 'ss06', 'zero', 'onum'",
  "terminal.integrated.fontLigatures.enabled": true,
  "terminal.integrated.tabs.enabled": true,
  "terminal.integrated.allowMnemonics": true,
  "terminal.integrated.allowChords": false,
  "terminal.integrated.cursorBlinking": true,
  "terminal.integrated.defaultLocation": "editor",
  "terminal.integrated.suggest.enabled": true,
  "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.enabled": true,
  "terminal.integrated.profiles.linux": {
    "zsh": { "path": "/bin/zsh" },
    "tmux-shell": { "path": "tmux", "args": ["new-session", "-A", "-s", "vscode:${workspaceFolderBasename}"] }
  },
  "terminal.integrated.env.windows": {},
  "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.windows": "Git Bash",
    "terminal.integrated.enableVisualBell": false,
  "terminal.integrated.scrollback": 10000,
  "terminal.integrated.enableMultiLinePasteWarning": "never",

  // === Files ===
  "files.trimTrailingWhitespace": false,
  "files.trimFinalNewlines": true,
  "files.associations": { "*.html": "html", "*.vue": "vue", "*.yml": "dockercompose" },
  "files.watcherExclude": {
    "**/node_modules/**": true,
    "**/.git/**": true,
    "**/dist/**": true,
    "**/build/**": true,
    "**/tmp/**": true
  },

  // === Workbench & Window ===
  "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
  "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
  "workbench.editor.tabSizing": "shrink",
  "workbench.editor.showTabs": "multiple",
  "workbench.editor.wrapTabs": true,
  "workbench.editor.decorations.badges": true,
  "workbench.editor.pinnedTabsOnSeparateRow": true,
  "workbench.tree.renderIndentGuides": "always",
  "workbench.sideBar.location": "right",
  "window.customTitleBarVisibility": "auto",
  "window.menuBarVisibility": "compact",
  "workbench.colorTheme": "Compline",
  "workbench.iconTheme": "file-icons-colourless",
  "window.newWindowProfile": "Default",

  // === Search ===
  "search.followSymlinks": false,
  "search.useIgnoreFiles": true,

  // === Git & Source Control ===
  "git.autofetch": false,
  "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
  "git.ignoreRebaseWarning": true,
  "git.openRepositoryInParentFolders": "always",

  // === Diff Editor ===
  "diffEditor.renderSideBySide": false,
  "diffEditor.ignoreTrimWhitespace": false,

  // === Telemetry ===
  "telemetry.telemetryLevel": "off",
  "redhat.telemetry.enabled": true,

  // === Accessibility ===
  "accessibility.signals.terminalBell": { "sound": "on" },
  "accessibility.dimUnfocused.enabled": true,

  // === Languages & Formatters ===
  "[javascript]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.typescript-language-features" },
  "[typescript]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.typescript-language-features" },
  "[typescriptreact]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode" },
  "[json]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.json-language-features" },
  "[jsonc]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.json-language-features" },
  "[css]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.css-language-features" },
  "[html]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode" },
  "[vue]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode" },
  "[php]": { "editor.linkedEditing": false },
  "[markdown]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "DavidAnson.vscode-markdownlint" },

  // === JSON & YAML Schemas ===
  "json.schemas": [ { "$schema": "https://json.schemastore.org/jsconfig" } ],
  "json.maxItemsComputed": 15000,
  "yaml.schemas": {
    "file:///home/sheen/.vscode/extensions/atlassian.atlascode-4.0.11/resources/schemas/pipelines-schema.json": "bitbucket-pipelines.yml"
  },

  // === Emmet ===
  "emmet.includeLanguages": { "twig": "html", "tpl": "html", "blade": "html" },

  // === Vue ===
  "vue.autoInsert.dotValue": true,
  "vue.inlayHints.missingProps": true,
  "vue.inlayHints.vBindShorthand": true,

  // === Markdown ===
  "markdown.preview.fontSize": 14,
  "markdown.preview.lineHeight": 1.4,

  // === Debug & SCM ===
  "debug.console.fontSize": 14,
  "scm.inputFontSize": 14,

  // === Miscellaneous ===
  "gulp.autoDetect": "off",
  "scss.validate": false,
  "css.validate": false,
  "less.validate": false,
  "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
  "database-client.autoSync": true,
  "chat.commandCenter.enabled": false,
  "containers.containers.label": "Compose Project Name",
  "atlascode.jira.enabled": true,
  "atlascode.bitbucket.enabled": true,

  // === Unicode Highlight ===
  "editor.unicodeHighlight.allowedCharacters": { "е": true, "і": true, "ᐳ": true, "’": true, "️": true, "І": true },
  "editor.unicodeHighlight.allowedLocales": { "ru": true },

  // === Remote & Extensions ===
  "remote.defaultExtensionsIfInstalledLocally": [ "GitHub.copilot", "GitHub.copilot-chat", "GitHub.vscode-pull-request-github" ],

  // === Copilot & Console Ninja ===
  "github.copilot.enable": { "*": true, "plaintext": false, "markdown": false, "scminput": false, "php": true, "vue": true, "ts": true, "javascript": true, "sh": true, "bash": true, "js": true, "json": true, "typescript": true, "md": true },
  "console-ninja.featureSet": "Community",
  "github.copilot.chat.agent.autoFix": false,
  "github.copilot.selectedCompletionModel": "",
  "github.copilot.nextEditSuggestions.enabled": true,
  "github.copilot.chat.anthropic.thinking.enabled": true,

  // === Editor experimental features ===
  "editor.experimental.preferTreeSitter.ini": true,
  "editor.experimental.preferTreeSitter.regex": true,

  // === TypeScript ===
  "typescript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled": "always",
  "typescript.tsdk": "node_modules/typescript/lib",

  // === Dockercompose language scope ===
  "[dockercompose]": { "editor.insertSpaces": true, "editor.tabSize": 2, "editor.autoIndent": "advanced", "editor.quickSuggestions": { "other": true, "comments": false, "strings": true }, "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode" },

  // === Chat / Editor helpers ===
  "chat.editor.wordWrap": "on",
  "chat.agentSessionsViewLocation": "view",
  "chat.mcp.gallery.enabled": true,

  // === Commit message generation instructions ===
  "github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGeneration.instructions": [
    { "text": "Use conventional commit message format." },
    { "text": "STRICT FORMAT: <type>(<scope>): <summary>. Example: feat(auth.service.ts): add token refresh logic." },
    { "text": "IMPORTANT: Each changed file MUST have its own separate line in format: <type>(<filename>): <description>." },
    { "text": "IMPORTANT:Type must be one of: feat, fix, chore, refactor, docs, test." },
    { "text": "Scope MUST be the exact filename with extension (e.g., auth.service.ts, Header.vue, api.routes.ts)." },
    { "text": "For multiple files - create multiple lines, one per file. Do NOT combine into single title." },
    { "text": "Do NOT separete title line with empty lines." },
    { "text": "Example for 3 files:\nfeat(auth.service.ts): add login method\nfix(api.routes.ts): register auth endpoint\nchore(auth.types.ts): define AuthResponse type" },
    { "text": "Commit body is OPTIONAL. Add it only if file-level descriptions are insufficient to explain WHY the change was made." },
    { "text": "If commit body is needed: separate it from file lines with one empty line." },
    { "text": "Keep commit body concise - max 50-75 characters total." },
    { "text": "Avoid phrases like 'This commit introduces', 'Added support for', etc." }
  ],

  // === Auto-approve & tools (review these) ===
  "chat.tools.terminal.autoApprove": { "npm run build": { "approve": true, "matchCommandLine": true }, "/^npx tsc --noEmit$/": { "approve": true, "matchCommandLine": true } },

  // === Sampling / Models ===
  "chat.mcp.serverSampling": { "Global in Code: shadcnVue": { "allowedModels": ["copilot/gpt-5-mini", "copilot/auto", "copilot/claude-sonnet-4.5"] } },

  "chat.instructionsFilesLocations": {
    ".github/instructions": true,
    "/home/user/.aitk/instructions/": true
  }
}"}
